events.title: Elections presidentielle a Taiwan
events.description: Taiwan holds presidential elections with candidates ranging from pro-independence to pro-unification.
events.description_fr: Taiwan organise des elections presidentielles avec des candidats allant de l'independance au rapprochement avec la Chine.

events.title: Ukraine Counteroffensive Operations
events.description: Ukraine continues military operations to regain territory.
events.description_fr: L'Ukraine poursuit ses operations militaires pour reconquerir son territoire.

events.title: BRICS Expansion Summit
events.description: BRICS considers new members including Saudi Arabia, UAE, Egypt, Ethiopia, Iran, and Argentina.
events.description_fr: Les BRICS envisagent de nouveaux membres dont l'Arabie Saoudite, les EAU, l'Egypte, l'Ethiopie, l'Iran et l'Argentine.

events.title: US Presidential Election
events.description: The United States holds presidential elections with significant global implications.
events.description_fr: Les Etats-Unis organisent des elections presidentielles aux implications mondiales significatives.

events.title: Chinese Military Exercises Near Taiwan
events.title_fr: Exercices militaires chinois pres de Taiwan
events.description: China conducts large-scale military exercises in the Taiwan Strait.
events.description_fr: La Chine mene des exercices militaires de grande envergure dans le detroit de Taiwan.

events.title: Iran Nuclear Negotiations
events.description: World powers attempt to revive nuclear negotiations with Iran.
events.description_fr: Les grandes puissances tentent de relancer les negociations nucleaires avec l'Iran.

events.title: Arctic Resource Competition
events.description: Rising tensions over Arctic resources as ice melts open new shipping routes.
events.description_fr: Tensions croissantes pour les ressources arctiques alors que la fonte des glaces ouvre de nouvelles routes maritimes.

events.title: African Union Security Reform
events.title_fr: Reforme de securite de l'Union Africaine
events.description: The African Union implements major security and economic reforms.
events.description_fr: L'Union Africaine met en oeuvre d'importantes reformes de securite et economiques.

events.title: New Space Race Intensifies
events.title_fr: Intensification de la nouvelle course spatiale
events.description: Competition between USA, China, and private companies for lunar resources.
events.description_fr: Competition entre les USA, la Chine et les entreprises privees pour les ressources lunaires.

events.title: South China Sea Incident
events.title_fr: Incident en mer de Chine meridionale
events.description: A naval incident occurs between Chinese and Philippine vessels in disputed waters.
events.description_fr: Un incident naval survient entre des navires chinois et philippins dans les eaux contestees.

events.title: India Becomes Third Largest Economy
events.title_fr: L'Inde devient la troisieme economie mondiale
events.description: India's economy surpasses Japan to become the world's third largest.
events.description_fr: L'economie indienne depasse le Japon pour devenir la troisieme mondiale.

events.title: European Defense Initiative
events.description: EU member states agree to establish a rapid reaction force.
events.description_fr: Les Etats membres de l'UE conviennent de creer une force de reaction rapide.

events.title: Saudi-Israel Normalization Talks
events.description: Saudi Arabia and Israel engage in historic normalization discussions.
events.description_fr: L'Arabie Saoudite et Israel engagent des discussions historiques de normalisation.

events.title: Korean Peninsula Crisis
events.description: North Korea conducts provocative military tests raising regional tensions.
events.description_fr: La Coree du Nord effectue des tests militaires provocateurs elevant les tensions regionales.

events.title: Global Economic Slowdown
events.description: A global economic recession affects major economies.
events.description_fr: Une recession economique mondiale affecte les principales economies.

events.title: Historic Climate Agreement
events.description: Major powers agree on binding emissions targets.
events.description_fr: Les grandes puissances s'accordent sur des objectifs d'emissions contraignants.

events.title: Major Cyber Attack on Infrastructure
events.description: A significant cyber attack disrupts critical infrastructure in multiple countries.
events.description_fr: Une cyberattaque importante perturbe les infrastructures critiques de plusieurs pays.

events.title: Latin American Economic Integration
events.description: MERCOSUR expands with new free trade agreements.
events.description_fr: Le MERCOSUR s'elargit avec de nouveaux accords de libre-echange.

events.title: AI Military Systems Race
events.description: Major powers compete to deploy AI-powered military systems.
events.description_fr: Les grandes puissances rivalisent pour deployer des systemes militaires bases sur l'IA.

events.title: India-Pakistan Dialogue
events.description: India and Pakistan resume diplomatic talks after years of tensions.
events.description_fr: L'Inde et le Pakistan reprennent les pourparlers diplomatiques apres des annees de tensions.

event_chains.name: Taiwan Crisis Escalation
event_chains.name_fr: Escalade de la crise de Taiwan
